gameobjects

Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameobjects.GameObject
      • gameobjects.NPC

  • public class NPC
extends GameObject
    Class that holds all the information for an NPC within the game, using a strategy interface it selects a strategy to use during the game
    Author:
    Jack Slater

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  NPC.Strategy
      Interface for the strategy that the interface uses, this will be defined as two strategies: a random strategy and a circle strategy

    • Constructor Summary
